name: Oceanic Ascension
description:
Our Submission for the ZenoJam 6 2022! Help Savy the Cat escape the dangers of the ocean, collect oxygen to stay alive!

-- Controls --

WASD - Move

E - Repair (Stops Movement and Oxygen Depletion)

Tab/Esc - Pause

-- Credits -- A game by DairyDevs

Art - Jacob Hocking

Programming - Jean Vigroux and Peter Bedrick

Music - James Calano

Sounds - Freesound.org

Special thanks to Savy the Cat MVP
